Text: Salvager swears he saw lights moving inside a Monolith wreck. Lights in patterns, like they were trying to communicate.
Someone's been buying up all the EMP shielding in the outer districts. Word is they're planning to go deep into the cascade zone.
Automated factory in Sector 9 started producing components nobody's seen before. Combine's trying to keep it quiet.
Three different scavenger teams have disappeared near the old processing plant. Something's hunting in there.
The Archivists aren't the original owners of the Black Vault. They just found it first after the cascade.
Signal emanating from the vault's depths matches pre-cascade radio astronomy data. It's older than the Harvesters.
Vultures Union found intact Harvester power cores, but they're not selling. Building something big down at the docks.
Ship captain claims he saw the ocean glowing green near the deeper wharves. Says it hurt to look at.
Tunnel collapse in Section C wasn't an accident. Wardens are covering up something they found down there.
New graffiti appearing overnight in sealed tunnels. Same symbols found at Harvester sites.
Directorate's been stockpiling medical supplies and radiation meds. Planning something dangerous.
Guard heard command discussing 'Project Lighthouse' - something about signals to space.
Pre-cascade governments knew the Harvesters were coming. All the evacuation routes were planned in advance.
Hybrid technology isn't reverse-engineered. Harvesters designed it specifically for humans to find.
There's a thirteenth faction operating in the shadows. No one knows their agenda.
The cascade event wasn't an accident. Someone triggered it deliberately.
Augmented mercs from the early days are starting to lose their minds. The alien tech is eating their brains.
Trader found a working Harvester communication device. Started receiving messages in dead languages.
Black market lottery for Alien tech is rigged. Archivists keep the good stuff for themselves.
Someone's been counterfeiting credit chips with Harvester technology. Economy could collapse.
Free 77 took a contract to eliminate faction leaders. Nobody knows who's paying.
Major convoy war coming. All the big players are positioning forces.
New Hybrid weapons are showing up with safeguards nobody programmed. They're learning.
Combine found a way to synthesize Harvester alloys. They're going to corner the market.
